onPressed.description: The function to be called when the actionable is pressed.

onDoublePressed.description: The function to be called when the actionable is double pressed.

onLongPressed.description: The function to be called when the actionable is long pressed.

onPressedCancel.description: The function to be called when the actionable is pressed inside and released outside of the actionable, causing it to cancel the press action.

onHovered.description: The function to be called when the actionable is hovered.
